dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notification
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Glynis Edwards [mailto:g.edwards@travel-quest.co.uk] 
Sent: Thursday, March 31, 2005 11:42 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notification


To: 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
Lance Crosby, Esq. 
Chief Operating Officer 
1333 Stemmons Freeway 
Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 75207 
  
  

Dear Lance Crosby, Esq., 


We would like to notify you that a site housed on your servers and run from
the domain http://www.hopenow.info has breached copyright of our site at
http://www.travel-quest.co.uk. 


This site has totally copied our entire site, replacing all references to
our company name with 'hopenow', replacing some of the banner advertising
with their own and adding additional advertising of their own. This is a
completely unauthorized use and has been done without our knowledge. 


We wrote to them (at both: comehope@gawab.com and webmaster@hopenow.info) on
the 30th March with a polite request asking that they remove the copyright
material within 24 hours, but this was not done. Please advise how we can
get this material removed as it not only breaches copyright, but we are also
very concerned that it will jeopardize our position with the Search Engines
due to duplicate content penalties; this could ruin our business! 


Our site has been in existence for well over 5 years and you can confirm we
are the original owners of the material by taking a look at the Wayback
Machine: http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.travel-quest.co.uk. 


The owner of the domain http://www.hopenow.info has also left in a number of
links that confirm the original source of the material: for example on the
page: http://www.hopenow.info/tqfamily.htm there is a link to Butlins at the
top of the page, this is an affiliate link that contains 'travelquest' as
it's identifier. The affiliate network that provides these links (But.At:
http://users.buy.at) will also be able to confirm that travel-quest is the
rightful owner if these links. 


www.hopenow.info have also left in our street address in the UK and links to
our website design company site! 


In line with the legal notice on your site, I can confirm that the
information in this email is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I
am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 


I can be contacted by email at: g.edwards@travel-quest.co.uk 
By post at: Travel-Quest, Quest Directories, 40 Magdalen Avenue, Bath, N. E.
Somerset, BA2 4QB, UK 
And by phone on (UK Number): 01225 420 869 


The WhoIS information for www.hopenow.info is shown at the foot of this
email. I hope this gives you all the information you require, do please
contact me if you need anything else. 


Yours sincerely, 
Glynis Edwards 
(travel-quest) 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------
